text: Evergreen Lake is a reservoir located in McLean County, Illinois and Woodford County, Illinois. Created by damming Six Mile Creek, it was built for recreation, sport fishing, and water supply purposes. The lake is long and wide. The nearest town is Kappa, Illinois, north of Normal, Illinois. Evergreen Lake is managed for crappie fishing. There is a 10-h.p. power limit on the lake. ==References== Evergreen Category:Bodies of water of McLean County, Illinois Category:Bodies of water of Woodford County, Illinois
title: Evergreen Lake (Illinois)
